title: Episode 123 – Marissa Pulaski, Co-Founder, Drylands Agroecology Research
subtitle: HIS and HERS
description: This episode with Marissa is a special “HERS” episode, which pairs with the “HIS” episode with DAR Co-Founder Nick DiDominico. Through DAR, the couple offer Permaculture Design Certification workshops, regenerative agriculture and drylands silvopasture design workshops, retreats for pre- and post-partum healing and restoration, and delightfully grounding dance parties.
